name: Bubonic
description:
In the early 1300s, a slew of doom originated and marched from lands unknown to man, in the form of rats. Yes. Those filthy rodents that feed on your dreams and aspirations. An unnamed hero has thrown his lifelong ambitions behind his back to face off what the locals called, The Black Death.

All included assets are original except one font: https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font

Credits:

  • Development: Omar Sadek, Youssef Abusamra
  • Art: Emad Maged
  • OST and SFX: Youssef Abusamra
  • Level Design: Omar Sadek
